PHASE SUMMARY — Mercedes — middle

Role: Mercedes is a guest at the Morcerf residence, interacting with the Count of Monte Cristo, Albert, and Madame de Morcerf.

Traits: Mercedes is described as having "fine eyes" and is capable of expressing "fervent" gratitude, suggesting she is emotionally expressive and possibly pious.

Relationships: Mercedes is related to Albert (her son) and Madame de Morcerf (her mother-in-law). She also interacts with the Count of Monte Cristo, showing a positive and grateful attitude towards him.

Notable behaviors: Mercedes raises her eyes to heaven with an expression of gratitude, suggesting she is a devout person.
